title: Why cannot the M635 be switched to the USB flash drive modeï¼Ÿ
answer:
Check whether the phone has ongoing data services (such as WAP). If yes, the phone cannot be switched to the USB flash drive mode. Therefore, you need to quit the data service process.  
If the problem persists, check whether the microSD card is installed properly. When a microSD card is not installed on the phone, the phone cannot be switched to the USB flash drive mode.
